theBalance:RarePower.NAME: Placeholder Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, TOUCH #b

theBalance:MirrorBarrierPower.NAME: Mirror Barrier
DESCRIPTIONS: When damaged, the attacker takes equal damage.

theBalance:EmpathyDollPower.NAME: Empathy Doll
DESCRIPTIONS: When you have debuffs, debuffs you apply to enemies have +1 stacks.

theBalance:CalibratedWeightPower.NAME: Calibrated Weight
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose Strength, gain 3 Block. Whenever you lose Dexterity, deal 5 damage to a random enemy.

theBalance:ObservationNotesPower.NAME: Observation Notes
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, your next attack deals 3 more damage.

theBalance:DoodlePaperPower.NAME: Doodle Paper
DESCRIPTIONS: When you receive a debuff, 50% chance to spread it to all enemies.

theBalance:SemipermeablePower.NAME: Semipermeable
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you steal attributes, gain 2 additional temporary attributes.

theBalance:CalibratedScalePower.NAME: Calibrated Scale
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, when your Strength equals your Dexterity (not 0), gain [E].

theBalance:AceAgentPower.NAME: Ace Agent
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy gains Block, you gain equal Block (max 15 per trigger).
